name: Squelch
description:
Squelch is a lonely amorphous blob searching for some friends. Using Squelch's clingy nature explore 25 levels trying to find someone to hold on to, someone that doesn't leave. Squelch is a game of simplistic platforming through 5 distinct chapters descending towards Earth from the lonely emptiness of space.

Features:
  • 5 unique chapter settings
  • 5 levels in each chapter
  • Collectable bubble friends
  • Increasing levels of gravity each chapter
